column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////- Bosscat Fries: These were cooked well
column2: much better than the last time we ate here. The fries were actually cooked all the way through
column3: with a soft inside and a crunchy outside. The homemade ketchup is ok. I'm still a Heinz girl at heart. For me these fries are a solid 3.5 stars
column4: but the boyfriend gives them 5 stars. Judge for yourself. Fair warning
